about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Gujarat based Shubham Polyspin Limited is a company engaged in the manufacturing of Polypropylene Multifilament Yarn of various types including Air-Intermingled yarn, Twisted Yarn & Shubhlon Bag closing yarn.

The yarn produced from the company are used in various fields like Geo-Textiles, Filter Cloth, HDPE, In FIBC, PP Bags, Narrow Woven Fabrics (webbings & tapes) etc. All the products are marketed under the Trade Name SHUBLON ™. It sell Its products directly to the end users in India and directly and through merchandise in Overseas.

The company's manufacturing facility is located at Mehasana, Gujarat.

The company started by selling 100% of its products in the state of Gujarat. However with increased production capacity, it expanded its sales to states like Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh & Maharashtra. It also started exporting its products to international markets.

It has 31 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Shubham Polyspin IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shubham Polyspin IPO is a SME IPO of 1500000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2018, and closes on October 4, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shubham Polyspin IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shubham Polyspin IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shubham Polyspin IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shubham Polyspin IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shubham Polyspin IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shubham Polyspin IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shubham Polyspin IPO opens on September 28, 2018 and closes on October 4, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shubham Polyspin IPO?
faqs.answer: Shubham Polyspin IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shubham Polyspin IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shubham Polyspin IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
